service.name: Inbox
service.summary: Delivery system to handle theatre delivery.

publishes.name: content-delivery.accepted
publishes.summary: Event represents the content delivery is accepted and initiated.

publishes.name: content-delivery.finished
publishes.summary: Event represents the content delivery is complete.

publishes.name: content-delivery.rejected
publishes.summary: Event represents the delivery system currently assigned is unable to deliver the content.

markdown.content:
Inbox is the delivery system managing the automated end to end delivery of content to theatres worldwide over theatre appliance (WireTAP). It also enables the Exhibitor to manage their content and keys sent to their theatre.

<NodeGraph />
